text: (he nabee!) aap logon ko us din se daraayen, jab unapar yaatana aa jaayegee. to atyaachaaree kahengeh hamaare paalanahaar! hamen kuchh samay tak avasar de, ham teree baat (aamantran) sveekaar kar lenge aur rasoolon ka anusaran karenge, kya tum vahee nahin ho, jo isase pahale shapath le rahe the ki hamaara patan hona hee nahin hai
